languages.text: Маражай Эзирраеш погиб от рук Вольного Торговца, но след, оставленный им в душе Лорд-капитана, так и не исчез. Отравленн{mf|ый|ая} ядом, влитым в {mf|его|ее} жилы искусным и жестоким любовником, {name} год от года все больше погрязала в неизбывной, ненасытной жажде удовольствий за гранью морали и за счет чужих страданий.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh died by the Rogue Trader's hand, but the mark he left on the Lord Captain's soul never disappeared. Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilled and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.
languages.original_text: Маражай Эзирраеш погиб от рук Вольного Торговца, но след, оставленный им в душе Лорд-капитана, так и не исчез. Отравленн{mf|ый|ая} ядом, влитым в {mf|его|ее} жилы искусным и жестоким любовником, {name} год от года все больше погрязала в неизбывной, ненасытной жажде удовольствий за гранью морали и за счет чужих страданий.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh died by the Rogue Trader's hand, yet the mark left by his teachings in the Lord Captain's soul did never expire. Poisoned by the venom, that was infused into {mf|his|her} veins by the skilful and inhumane lover, {name} year after year dove deeper into the haunting and insatiable thirst for the pleasure beyond morals and at the expense of the suffering of others.

Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilful and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.

Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilled and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh died by the Rogue Trader's hand, but the mark he left on the Lord Captain's soul never disappeared. Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilled and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.

languages.text: 尽管玛拉斋·艾泽拉什最终死于行商浪人之手，但他留在领主舰长灵魂上的印记却从未消失。领主舰长那残忍、狡诈的爱人将剧毒注入了{mf|他|她}的血脉之中，不断毒害着{mf|他|她}。随着时间流逝，{name}越来越渴望扭曲的欢愉，欲望变得越来越难以满足，{mf|他|她}也越来越不顾他人死活。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh died by the Rogue Trader's hand, but the mark he left on the Lord Captain's soul never disappeared. Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilled and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.

traits.locale_text: 尽管玛拉斋·艾泽拉什最终死于行商浪人之手，但他留在领主舰长灵魂上的印记却从未消失。领主舰长那残忍、狡诈的爱人将剧毒注入了{mf|他|她}血脉之中，不断毒害着{mf|他|她}。随着时间流逝，{name}越来越渴望扭曲的欢愉，欲望变得越来越难以满足，{mf|他|她}也越来越不顾他人死活。

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh starb durch die Hände {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, doch das Mal, das er auf der Seele des Lord Captains hinterlassen hatte, verschwand nie wieder. Das Gift, das {mf|sein|ihr} gerissener und sadistischer Liebhaber in {mf|seine|ihre} Adern injiziert hatte, vergiftete {name} im Laufe der Zeit. Immer drängender und unstillbarer wurde {mf|sein|ihr} Durst nach schändlichen Vergnügungen, ohne Rücksicht auf das Leid anderer.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh died by the Rogue Trader's hand, but the mark he left on the Lord Captain's soul never disappeared. Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilled and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh starb durch die Hände {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, doch das Mal, das er auf der Seele des Lord Captains hinterlassen hatte, verschwand nie wieder. Das Gift, das {mf|sein|ihr} gerissener und sadistischer Liebhaber in {mf|seine|ihre} Adern injiziert hatte, vergiftete {name} im Laufe der Zeit. Immer drängender und unstillbarer wurde {mf|sein|ihr} Durst nach schändlichen Vergnügungen, ohne Rücksicht auf das Leid anderer.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh mourut des mains {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais il laissa une marque indélébile sur son âme. Victime du venin injecté dans ses veines par son amant aussi sadique que talentueux, {name} ne cessa jamais d'être {mf|tourmenté|tourmentée} par un appétit grandissant pour les plaisirs les plus abjects, au mépris des souffrances d'autrui.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh died by the Rogue Trader's hand, but the mark he left on the Lord Captain's soul never disappeared. Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilled and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh mourut des mains {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais il laissa une marque indélébile sur son âme. Victime du venin injecté dans ses veines par son amant aussi sadique que talentueux, {name} ne cessa jamais d'être {mf|tourmenté|tourmentée} par un appétit grandissant pour les plaisirs les plus abjects, au mépris des souffrances d'autrui.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh murió a manos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, pero la marca que dejó en el alma de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán nunca se borró. Corrompid{mf|o|a} por el veneno que su amante sádico y habilidoso inyectó en sus venas, a lo largo de los años {name} se sintió consumid{mf|o|a} por una sed constante e insaciable por los placeres más oscuros, sin ninguna consideración por el sufrimiento ajeno.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh died by the Rogue Trader's hand, but the mark he left on the Lord Captain's soul never disappeared. Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilled and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh murió a manos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, pero la marca que dejó en el alma de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán nunca se borró. Corrompid{mf|o|a} por el veneno que su amante sádico y habilidoso inyectó en sus venas, a lo largo de los años {name} se sintió consumid{mf|o|a} por una sed constante e insaciable por los placeres más oscuros, sin ninguna consideración por el sufrimiento ajeno.

languages.text: マラズハイ・アエジレシュは自由開拓者の手によって死んだが、彼がロード・キャプテンの魂に残した傷跡は決して消えることはなかった。巧妙なサディストの恋人によって静脈に毒を注入され、何年にもわたって{name}は他人の苦しみに無頓着となり、凶悪な快楽への呪われた飽くなき渇きにますます蝕まれていった。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh died by the Rogue Trader's hand, but the mark he left on the Lord Captain's soul never disappeared. Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilled and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.

traits.locale_text: マラズハイ・アエジレシュは自由開拓者の手によって死んだが、彼がロード・キャプテンの魂に残した傷跡は決して消えることはなかった。巧妙なサディストの恋人によって静脈に毒を注入され、何年にもわたって{name}は他人の苦しみに無頓着となり、凶悪な快楽への呪われた飽くなき渇きにますます蝕まれていった。

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Hür Tacir'in ellerinde can verdi ancak Lord Kaptan'ın ruhunda bıraktığı izler hiçbir zaman yok olmadı. Becerikli ve sadist âşığı tarafından damarlarına enjekte edilen zehir nedeniyle {name}, yıllar geçtikçe ahlaksız zevkleri daha da arzulayan ve başkalarının çektiği acılara en ufak aldırış göstermeye birine dönüştü.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh died by the Rogue Trader's hand, but the mark he left on the Lord Captain's soul never disappeared. Poisoned by the venom that was injected into {mf|his|her} veins by {mf|his|her} skilled and sadistic lover, over the years {name} was consumed more and more by a haunting and insatiable thirst for heinous pleasures, heedless of the suffering of others.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Hür Tacir'in ellerinde can verdi ancak Lord Kaptan'ın ruhunda bıraktığı izler hiçbir zaman yok olmadı. Becerikli ve sadist âşığı tarafından damarlarına enjekte edilen zehir nedeniyle {name} yıllar geçtikçe ahlaksız zevkleri daha fazla arzulayan ve başkalarının çektiği acılara karşı daha aldırışsız biri hâline geldi.
